summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Ward v0 decision support system. All backend APIs (26/26 tests) and frontend UI flows passed successfully. AI decision generation with Gemini 2.5 Flash working correctly. Section-by-section approval workflow, override handling with rationale requirement, and audit trails all functioning as expected.

minor_issues.issue: AI generation occasionally takes slightly longer than 15 seconds (completed in ~20 seconds)
minor_issues.impact: Minor - does not affect functionality, just requires slightly longer wait time

passed_tests: Backend: Create disruption case with shipment identifiers
Backend: List all cases for user
Backend: Get case details with draft, approvals, and decision
Backend: AI decision structure generation (6-step protocol)
Backend: Worst-case scenarios for all alternatives
Backend: Decision finalization with recommended choice
Backend: Override handling with rationale requirement
Frontend: Page load and login page render
Frontend: Create case form with dynamic fields
Frontend: AI decision generation button and workflow
Frontend: Section approval buttons and state management
Frontend: Alternative selection with radio buttons
Frontend: Override modal with rationale input

success_percentage.integration: 100% (AI generation, approval workflow, override handling all working)

authentication.details: Email/password registration and login working correctly. JWT tokens generated and validated properly.

case_management.details: Create, list, and get case operations working. Shipment identifiers (IDs, routes, carriers) properly stored and displayed.

ai_decision_generation.details: Gemini 2.5 Flash integration working. All 6 sections generated: decision_framing, known_inputs, declared_assumptions, alternatives, recommendation. Evidence labeling present with source, freshness, and reliability. Alternatives limited to 3. Worst-case scenarios prominently displayed.

approval_workflow.details: Section-by-section approval working for all 5 sections. Approval state persisted and displayed with lock icons.

decision_finalization.details: Finalization working for both recommended and override scenarios. Override requires rationale input.

override_handling.details: Override detection working correctly. Modal appears when non-recommended option selected. Rationale required and stored. Override flag and rationale displayed in finalized decision.

audit_trail.details: Global and case-specific audit trails working. All actions logged with case_id, actor, action, payload, and timestamp.

ui_ux.details: Clean, professional UI. Status badges with appropriate colors. Forms well-structured. Navigation intuitive. All interactive elements properly styled and clickable. Override rationale highlighted in warning color.
